Text: Great upload m8! is this like FSPassengers? i've had huge problems with fspassengers that i gave up with it. kept giving me aircraft errors and stuff.

Hmmm this one is borked...
It seems to crash due to a lack of license, and never ever asks for a serial :P
So this is either a fake or broken.

I've had some issues with FS passenger X too. I hope this one's trouble-free. Does this have the same sort of qualities as the FsPassenger X? Can You create companies and watch their success? Does it record personal data and improvement?
